name: Godzilla: Destroy All Monsters Melee
description: Godzilla: Destroy All Monsters Melee is a fighting game developed by Pipeworks Software and published by Infogrames for GameCube in 2002. A similar but different game was later released for Game Boy Advance as Godzilla: Domination!. A version for the Xbox with additional content was released in 2003 exclusively in North America. A PlayStation 2 version was planned, but later cancelled.
